RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: Muximori
RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: new_track_settings
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description:
Adds a preferences dialog to customise the visible columns in newly created tracks. This panel may be accessed in two ways: - A menu entry (Tools -> New Track Preferences) - A keybind (Pattern Editor -> Track Control -> New Track Preferences)
When you create a new track, these preferences will be applied.
The preference dialog can be controlled by keyboard. Use the up and down arrow keys to select an option, and the left and right arrow keys to change values.
